thread.title: Ilary Blasi: Tottis wife announces pregnancy live on TV
thread.title_full: Ilary Blasi: Tottis wife announces pregnancy live on TV

title: Ilary Blasi: Tottis wife announces pregnancy live on TV
text:
Sports News | 30 September 2015 21:10 CET Ilary Blasi: Tottiâ€™s wife announces pregnancy live on TV - www.allsports.com.gh 
Francesco Totti's wife of 11 years Ilary Blasi announced live on Italian TV channel Italia 1 that the couple are expecting their third child. 
The model and showgirl revealed the news during the first episode of the new series of satirical sketch show Le Iene, which she presents. 
The special news came on the Roma captain's birthday and was met with warm cheers by the studio audience. 
'I just want to take 20 seconds to share some news with you, my friends the audience, who have followed me for years,' said Blasi. 
'The smash hit this year is [Italian comic trio] Trio Medusa, right? Well, on stage with me and you, Teo, there's another trio.' 
She followed this statement up by pointing to her baby bump. 
The 34-year-old married Totti in June 2005, and the pair already have two children together: Cristian, 9, and Chanel, 8.
